title: RT: контрактник расстрелял сослуживцев под Белгородом и сбежал из части
cleaned_sentences: The Russia Today channel, citing a source, announced an incident in the Belgorod region.
There, the contractor opened fire on his colleagues and escaped from the military unit.
The report said that there are wounded as a result of shooting.
The area “Interception” has been announced in the area to detain the suspect.
He is charged with articles about desertion and attempted murder.
Local publics also publish the orientation on a certain Alexei Zhuravlev born in 1995.
According to preliminary data, the shooting occurred due to a conflict on household grounds.
Gennady Bondarev, the head of the Grevoronsky district, told RT that as a result of the shooting of the dead and wounded among the civilians, there were no firing in the military unit.
